short_desc: The Holly Center is a versatile facility where a wide range of events can be held including weddings, large banquets, conferences and an auditorium available for rent
description: The Holly Center is a versatile facility where a wide range of events can be held including weddings, large banquets, and conferences. The auditorium has a stage and a large kitchen. The Holly Senior Room is a great room for small events like baby showers or meetings.Cooling center open for everyone when temperatures are extreme. Open: Monday - Thursday, 9-8pm; Friday, 9-6pm.
